Samurai Captive is about perce=

deadly mixture with lust and a high=
 stakes game involving the opium trade.

This e-book opens with the Richard=
son Incident (The Namamugi Incident)

 is injured and later sold to

nah not only enters into

he middle of an

red "barbarian" pet.

tic and thrilling
